pr_title: Add Main thread check under OSNotificationReceivedEvent

timeline.bodyText: Logic isn't specifically for wrappers. A native developer could call the complete from the main thread as well.
timeline.author: jkasten2

replies.bodyText: yeah, but will need to specially make it from the main thread, on native the service extender is being called from a worker
replies.author: Jeasmine

timeline.message:
Add Main thread check under OSNotificationReceivedEvent

* Flutter invoked methods are runned under MainThread, OSNotificationReceivedEvent complete method ends calling a MainThread check that crashes.
* Add MainThread check under OSNotificationReceivedEvent complete method
* If running on MainThread create a new thread to complete the notification
